alerts.failedShipmentsPartiallyPlacedBody: To buy these, please add them into your trolley and place the order for them again. You've not been charged for them.
alerts.failedShipmentsPartiallyPlacedBody_newCr: Your credit application was successful, but these items were not added to it, and you've not been charged for them.

newCreditApplication.heading: What now?
newCreditApplication.paragraphOne: You can add them back into your trolley and buy them now, but you will not be able to put them on credit, or apply for more credit.
newCreditApplication.paragraphTwo: Or you can wait until you receive your Argos Card (7-10 days) and use it to buy them later.
